Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
INVOCATION - Delivered by: Pastor Mullery Jean-Pierre, Senior Pastor, Beraca Baptist Church, located at 9602 Flatlands Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11236.

Motion to spread the Invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Narcisse.
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by Pastor Mullery Jean-Pierre, Senior Pastor, Beraca Baptist Church,
located at 9602 Flatlands Avenue, Brooklyn, N.Y. 11236.

Council Member Narcisse moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Items.Title: Adoption of Minutes
Items.AgendaNote: ADOPTION OF MINUTES - Motion that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of September 6, 2022 be adopted as printed by Council Member Sanchez.
Items.MinutesNote: On behalf of Council Member Sanchez, the Majority Leader (Council Member Powers) moved that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of September 6, 2022 be adopted as printed.

Items.MinutesNote: The Majority Leader (Council Member Powers) presiding as the President Pro Tempore.

The presence of a quorum was announced by the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers).

There were 50 Council Members marked present at this Stated Meeting.
At this point the Speaker (Council Member Adams) made the following annoucements:

Whereupon on motion of the Speaker (Council Member Adams), the Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) adjourned these proceedings to meet again for the Stated Meeting of Wednesday, October 12, 2022.

MICHAEL McSWEENEY, City Clerk
Clerk of the Council

Items.MinutesNote: The Majority Leader and Acting President Pro Tempore (Council Member Powers) put the question whether the Council would agree with and adopt such reports, which were decided in the affirmative by the following vote:

The following files were removed from the General Order Calendar and voted separately:

Int. No. 383-A,  VOTE: 43-7-0
Negative: CMs Ariola, Carr, Holden, Paladino, Vernikov, Yeger, and the Minority Leader (Council Member Borelli).

Res. No. 306-A.  VOTE: 49-1-0
Negative: CM Yeger.

Preconsidered Res. No. 327,  VOTE: 42-7-1
Negative: CMs Ariola, Carr, Holden, Paladino, Sanchez, Vernikov, and the Minority Leader (Council Member Borelli).
Abstention: CM Yeger.

L.U. No. 90 & Res. No. 336,
L.U. No. 91 & Res. No. 337,
L.U. No. 94 & Res. No. 338,
L.U. No. 95 & Res. No. 339:
